40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Abbas bin Abdul-Muttalib:that he heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: "Whoever is pleased with Allah as (his) Lord, and Islam as (his) religion, and Muhammad as (his) Prophet, then he has tasted the sweetness of faith

chapter.eng-name: The Hadith: "He Has Tasted The Sweetness Of Faith" And The Hadith: "There Are Three Things For Which Whomever Has Them Then He Has Tasted The Sweetness Of Faith"
